name: Welcome to Kite ONLINE
description:
Lore

Kite ONLINE is a virtual space where the cool kids used to gather...
But now it has fallen out of fashion and the game is slowly dying.
With a friend you decide to try to beat the online social platformer as fast as possible and discover all the landmarks by adding some "customized features" .

Controls

Use a keyboard or a xbox controller to play.
Jump with Space/A
 Navigate checkpoints with X
